com.spotify.apollo.request

Interface OngoingRequest

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TrackedOngoingRequest
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForwardingOngoingRequest

    public interface OngoingRequest
    A request that is being processed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static InetSocketAddress PORT_ZERO 
      static ServerInfo UNKNOWN_SERVER_INFO

      • isExpired

        boolean isExpired()

      • arrivalTimeNanos

        default long arrivalTimeNanos()
        Get the arrival time of the incoming request in nanoseconds. Note that this is not unix epoch as the time is provided by System.nanoTime(). To get unix epoch time, do something like: 
         
 long processingTimeNanos = System.nanoTime() - requestContext.arrivalTimeNanos();
 long arrivalTimeUnixEpochMillis = System.currentTimeMillis() +
                                   TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS.toMillis(processingTimeNanos);
        See Also:
        System.nanoTime()
